CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When considering that PIDT-C12NT shows higher hole mobility and superior absorption to that of PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT , it is rational to envisage that PIDT-C12NT would achieve superior processability and backbone planarity among three polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. PIDT-C12NT
2. PIDT - EHNT
3. PIDT - DTNT

These are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph. They are names of chemical compounds being compared for their properties.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PIDT-C12NT
2. PIDT - EHNT
3. PIDT - DTNT

These are the relevant "Material Name" entities in the paragraph. I have removed any other words or phrases as they do not refer to chemical compounds.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT-C12NT |
| PIDT - EHNT |
| PIDT - DTNT |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When considering that PIDT-C12NT shows higher hole mobility and superior absorption to that of PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT , it is rational to envisage that PIDT-C12NT would achieve superior processability and backbone planarity among three polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. PIDT-C12NT
2. higher hole mobility
3. superior absorption
4. PIDT - EHNT
5. PIDT - DTNT
6. superior processability
7. backbone planarity

These are the "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph. They are the properties or characteristics that are being compared or contrasted among the three polymers mentioned.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. higher hole mobility
2. superior absorption
3. superior processability
4. backbone planarity

These are the "Material Property" entities in the given paragraph. They are the properties or characteristics that are being compared or contrasted among the three polymers mentioned. The other entities (PIDT-C12NT, PIDT - EHNT, PIDT - DTNT) are material names and not material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| higher hole mobility |
| superior absorption |
| superior processability |
| backbone planarity |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When considering that PIDT-C12NT shows higher hole mobility and superior absorption to that of PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT , it is rational to envisage that PIDT-C12NT would achieve superior processability and backbone planarity among three polymers.

Let's think step by step.

1. Higher hole mobility: This is the first "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. It refers to the mobility of holes in the PIDT-C12NT material being higher than that of PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT.
2. Superior absorption: This is the second "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. It refers to the superior absorption capacity of PIDT-C12NT compared to PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT.
3. Superior processability: This is the third "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. It suggests that PIDT-C12NT is expected to have better processability than PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT.
4. Backbone planarity: This is the fourth "Property Value" entity in the paragraph. It implies that PIDT-C12NT is likely to have a more planar backbone than PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Higher hole mobility
2. Superior absorption
3. Superior processability
4. Backbone planarity

These four entities clearly refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Higher hole mobility |
| Superior absorption |
| Superior processability |
| Backbone planarity |
